list.name: Changes
list.comment: [Fine-tune-accelerated 2.5 ] MAJOR REVIEW, same memory space but doubled the size of the batch. - Gradient Checkpointing issues solved (accelerate) - Some bugs related to unstability of the gradient calculations! - zero2 is the most stable solution (for now)

task.summary: Default task
DATASET TRACKING Update, all the progress about the dataset creation and replication.
Add of src and other download files from alvis
Reorganization download, src and other parts.
Preprocessing, download and other stuff
Report Radiology mimic preprocessing
Preprocessing Code for mimic
Some advancements on the MIMIC dataset, ...
[PREPROCESSING] New dataset code (COVID-CXR3, CXR14, CHEXPERT, CXR14)
[PREPROCESSING] new datasets, like rexGradient160k. Removal of older dataset not useful.
[PREPROCESSING] reorganization of work, exclusion of different datasets.
[PREPROCESSING] mimic_cxr.py and chexpert_public.py completed for compilation, rexAgent160k missing.
[Preprocessing v1] The compile_chexinstruct.py has produced the first complete dataset. Still some work to do on some of the task remaining.
[Preprocessing v2] The compile_chexinstruct.py has produced the first complete dataset. The compilation still have some bugs.
[Preprocessing v3] The compile_chexinstruct.py has produced the first complete dataset. The compilation still have some bugs, unchecked
[Preprocessing v4] The compile_chexinstruct.py has produced the first complete dataset. The compilation still have some bugs, unchecked
[ChexIns] Creation of the HF data for the fine-tuning of GEMMA.
[ChexIns - Completed] Creation of the HF data for the fine-tuning of GEMMA. The save_to_disk function doesn't work properly, moved to parquet saving.
[ChexIns - Benchmarking HF models] Dataset created successfully, a part is missing about the benchmark_train_cost.py that need to be completed for the bench of VLMs.
[ChexIns - Dataset] New classes for VLMs models, and new functions.
[Formatter, Benchmark, SFFT] New version of formatting v2
[Fine-tune ] finetuning code for the gemma3 models.

[Fine-tune ] removing Unsloth collator, and addition of code for: deepspeed zero2, zero3. Code collected from the public repo of deepspeed, correction to some bug related to rank numbers ans world-sizes.

[Fine-tune-accelerated 1.0 ] removing Unsloth implementations collator, and addition of code for: deepspeed zero2, zero3. Code collected from the public repo of deepspeed, correction to some bug related to rank numbers ans world-sizes. New addition and reorganization for the dataset tokenization, bug solutions.
[Fine-tune-accelerated 1.1 ] Adding Lora And parameter efficient fine-tuning.
[Fine-tune-accelerated 1.3 ] Correcting acceleratio issue, PEFT organized, instabiloty issues on GPUs.

[Fine-tune-accelerated 1.4 ] Correcting acceleratio issue, PEFT organized, instabiloty issues on GPUs. A new sampler has been written, Deepspeed config file uploaded, also with the possibility to profile FLOPS
[Fine-tune-accelerated 1.5 ] Correcting acceleratio issue. BEST s/iter 2.05-2.20 for batch size = 4 and A100-80gb.
[Fine-tune-accelerated 1.6 ]['MULTI NODE'][more data bug][mix] MULTI NODE accelerate config, format_chexinstruct.py correction for any image not readeble (corrupted).
[Fine-tune-accelerated 1.6 ]['MULTI NODE'][more data bug][mix] MULTI NODE working correctly with some debug configuration
[Fine-tune-accelerated 1.8 ] [Restoring finetune_accelerated.py to the commit [96e85956c07b13f7be514e4f296b232ded7372b4]
[Fine-tune-accelerated 1.8 ] CHECKOUT [Restoring finetune_accelerated.py to the commit [96e85956c07b13f7be514e4f296b232ded7372b4]
[Fine-tune-accelerated 2.1 ] The finetune_accelerated.py is the same. The Trainer function is new, Some other correction to bugs. The training now is stable.

[Fine-tune-accelerated 2.5 ] MAJOR REVIEW, same memory space but doubled the size of the batch. - Gradient Checkpointing issues solved (accelerate) - Some bugs related to unstability of the gradient calculations! - zero2 is the most stable solution (for now)
